metadata.dc:author: Alvarez Noves, J
metadata.dc:description: Some general considerations are made about the endogenous factors in cancer pathogenesis, writing about genetical susceptibility, hormonal factors, and the role of endogenous factors on the carcinogenesis mechanisms due to physical, chemical or biological agents.
metadata.dc:title: Los factores endógenos en la patogenia del cáncer.
[Endogenous factors in the pathogenesis of cancer].
